lines.text: create a map from strings to strings called gesture
set value for key " rock " of gesture to " scissors "
set value for key " scissors " of gesture to " paper "
set value for key " paper " of gesture to " rock "
let f , m and s be strings
if gesture [ f ] = m and gesture [ f ] = s
lines.code: if ( gesture [ f ] == m && gesture [ f ] == s )

lines.text: print " F " and a new line
else if gesture [ m ] = f and gesture [ m ] = s
lines.code: else if ( gesture [ m ] == f && gesture [ m ] == s )

lines.text: print " M " and a new line
else if gesture [ s ] = f and gesture [ s ] = m
lines.code: else if ( gesture [ s ] == f && gesture [ s ] == m )

lines.text: print " S " and a new line
